qts.quote: Pain tethers me to the world
qts.author: Finch

qts.quote: Intentions can be a fickle business.
qts.author: Finch

qts.quote: I missed on purpose, jackass.
qts.author: Shaw

qts.quote: Never send a human to do a machine's job.
qts.author: Agent Smith

qts.quote: Dodge this.
qts.author: Trinity

qts.quote: Stop trying to hit me and hit me.
qts.author: Morpheus

qts.quote: Do you think that's air you're breathing now?
qts.author: Morpheus

qts.quote: We're two different people. We can't have the same left.
qts.author: Charlie

qts.quote: You think I wouldn't know if the guy I'm dating is retarded?
qts.author: Dee

qts.quote: You gotta pay the troll toll, if you wanna get into that boy’s soul.
qts.author: Frank

qts.quote: Storm comin', hatchet comin'!
qts.author: Charlie

qts.quote: I’m not fat. I’m cultivating mass.
qts.author: Mac

qts.quote: Cat in the wall, eh?! Okay, now you’re talking my language.
qts.author: Charlie

qts.quote: Oh, shit. Look at that door, dude. See that door right there? The one marked 'pirate?' You think a pirate lives in there?
qts.author: Charlie

qts.quote: Fight Milk! The first alcoholic dairy based protein drink for bodyguards!
qts.author: Mac

qts.quote: Dayman, fighter of the Nightman, champion of the sun, you’re a master of karate and friendship for everyone!
qts.author: Dennis and Charlie

qts.quote: See, I’ve always got an A, B and C strike plan to get us out of any potentially life-threatening situation.
qts.author: Mac

qts.quote: If you're in my room, you're always being filmed.
qts.author: Dennis

qts.quote: I’m not gonna be buried in a grave. When I’m dead, just throw me in the trash.
qts.author: Frank

qts.quote: I looked for an 'I'm-sorry-I-got-you-shot' card, but they were all out.
qts.author: Joss Carter

qts.quote: If you really need a mystery, I recommend the human heart.
qts.author: Harold Finch

qts.quote: The world is a dangerous place, Elliott, not because of those who do evil, but because of those who look on and do nothing.
qts.author: Mr. Robot

qts.quote: Did you see that ludicrous display last night?
qts.author: Moss
